segments.script: "It's me again, Mr. New Vegas, reminding you that you're nobody 'til somebody loves you. We have a severe dust wall approaching with extreme radiation. Visibility will drop to zero. Seek shelter immediately in concrete structures or underground facilities like the Strip casinos, Vault entrances, or sewers. Avoid metal structures due to radiation risk. This situation is critical - stay safe and I'll guide you through it. Estimated all-clear time: 8 hours."

You're her.'"

segments.script:
Good morning to you, darling! It's a brand new day in this wild, wonderful wasteland we call home. The sun is rising high over the Mojave horizon at quarter past nine, casting that golden glow on our rugged landscape. 

It's me again, Mr. New Vegas, reminding you that you're nobody 'til somebody loves you. But as far as I'm concerned, every single one of my precious listeners deserves to be treasured and adored. So go out there today, take in the fresh desert air, and remember: magic is all around us if we just open our hearts to it. Stay tuned for more romance and revelry on Radio Appalachia!

segments.script:
"Evening Mrs. New Vegas, I hope this transmission finds you looking swell and feeling just as fine! Now, dig this juicy tidbit that's been circulating around the Mojave... Someone told me there's a secret underground bunker hidden deep beneath the I-15 Mojave Outpost. Apparently, it was built before the war, maybe even during the Cold War days. Rumor has it, high-ranking NCR officials have been sneaking in and out of that subterranean hideaway for years now.

Word is, they're planning something big - possibly a major operation to take down those pesky Caesar's Legion scum once and for all! Of course, this could all just be wild speculation. But wouldn't it be something if the truth came out? Wouldn't you love to get your hands on those classified documents, hmm? Ah, but that's a story for another time. For now, let's just enjoy the suspense, shall we?"
